channel.title: Andiamo! at Al Zeina, located at Raha Beach Road in Abu Dhabi is the top address for fresh and contemporary Italian Style food. Only fresh ingredients, prepared when you order are the basis for the best Pizza and Pasta in town.
channel.description: Andiamo! at Al Zeina, located at Raha Beach Road in Abu Dhabi is the top address for fresh and contemporary Italian Style food. Only fresh ingredients, prepared when you order are the basis for the best Pizza and Pasta in town.
